name: Tiny Clans: Three Kingdoms
description:
Tiny Clans：Three Kingdoms is the most strategy-focused in casual games, and the most casual tower defense game in the strategy games.

Players need to recruit and synthesize different generals, soldiers, and then line up their troops, adjust combat strategy in different weather and terrain conditions to achieve the ultimate victory!

Game features:

Strategy and preparedness
Under the command of Three-Kingdom heroes, various types of arms can 100% showed their magical powers. Constantly adjust the strategy towards different enemies, foster strengths and circumvent weaknesses, and then, the weak can even overcome the strong.

Investigation:
With a super realistic simulation system, terrain, weather can affect the whole battle here! The cavalry was not good at rushing through the woods, but it could conquer all the plain. In the hot and dry weather, the invulnerable vinegar soldier could be easily destroyed by fire arrow, and the fire mage in rainy weather would be greatly distressed. Knowing the weather changes in advance, and surveying the geographical terrain, then you can become the master of the battlefield, and take full advantage of the situation.

Conquer the world
In casual games, the player can also build kingdoms. With the help of the heroes from Three Kingdoms, start your conquering journey!

Come to "Tiny Clans", collect good generals, take charge of the soldiers, write your legend!
